channel.title: Rush
channel.itunes:summary: Rush is a one-year audio devotional created by Justin and Jennifer Camp, authors of the popular devotionals, WiRE and Loop, and co-founders of Gather Ministries, and designed to galvanize your relationship with God. It’s designed specifically for men and women who want to encounter the breath of God and practice responding to Him in their lives. Practical and prophetic, simple and counter-cultural. Rush is an opportunity in the middle of the busy of your day to slow down, even if just for a few moments, and consider what God is saying to you, right now.
channel.itunes:author: Gather Ministries
channel.description: Rush is a one-year audio devotional created by Justin and Jennifer Camp, authors of the popular devotionals, WiRE and Loop, and co-founders of Gather Ministries, and designed to galvanize your relationship with God. It’s designed specifically for men and women who want to encounter the breath of God and practice responding to Him in their lives. Practical and prophetic, simple and counter-cultural. Rush is an opportunity in the middle of the busy of your day to slow down, even if just for a few moments, and consider what God is saying to you, right now.

item.title: How Questions Can Deepen—Or Harm—Your Relationship With God
item.description:
Are you asking God the right questions? Sometimes the right questions become wrong because of the way we ask them. Learn how to deepen your relationship with God by asking the right questions.

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. Through our five ministries, we equip men and women to encounter God in the every-day lives they’re living. From Loop for Women, an email devotional focused on beauty & prayer, to WiRE for Men, an email devotional that helps men see life with God as the greatest adventure of all time, we hope we have something that matters to you.

. . . . .

Enjoying Rush? Please SUBSCRIBE to keep fresh episodes coming your way. Also, we’d be honored if you’d rate and review the podcast, as it helps others find and be encouraged by listening to it. To do so, scroll down the episode list in your chosen app until you reach the “Ratings & Reviews” section (Apple) or visit the show homepage, select the three dots next to the gear icon and tap “Rate show” (Spotify). Thank you!

Rush is made possible through generous, tax-deductible donations. You’ll notice we don’t run ads or use affiliate links. For more than ten years, God has provided faithful partners like you who keep this ministry going. We’d love your support. Visit https://www.gatherministries.com today and click “DONATE NOW” to help.

. . . . .

Looking for more FREE resources to equip your heart and fortify your spirit? Consider:

→ Loop for Women, a three-times-a-week email devotional anchored in prophetic prayer and designed to help you receive God’s love, meditate on his beauty, and tend to your precious heart. Subscribe FREE at https://www.loopforwomen.com.

Jennifer is the author of the best-selling book Breathing Eden: Conversations with God on Light, Fresh Air, and New Things. You can find it at https://bit.ly/Breathing-Eden.

→ WiRE for Men, a twice-a-week email devotional for men that tackles tough questions like “What does it mean to be a man today?” and “Why am I so angry?” and “How can I find true friendship?”. Subscribe FREE at https://www.wireformen.com.

WiRE is written by Justin Camp, author of Invention: Break Free from the Culture Hell-Bent on Holding You Back, Odyssey: Encounter the God of Heaven and Escape the Surly Bonds of this World, and Rescue: When God's Cavalry Arrives to Deliver You from Quiet Desperation. You can find them at https://bit.ly/WiRE-Series-for-Men or wherever books are sold.

→ Flag Messages, a once-a-week email that helps you encounter God through prayer, Scripture, and guided exercises. Flag invites you to go deeper into who God is, who he says you are, and what it means for the lives we’re living right now. Subscribe FREE at https://flagmessages.io/.

→ Rapt Interviews is a hub for curious, thoughtful thinkers, culture-changers, and creatives. Through interviews with the authors, pastors, and musicians you know and love, we give you a glimpse into how they’re encountering God in the midst of their dynamic lives. Twice a month, we serve up a curated newsletter of fascinating articles, new books & music we think you might like, exclusive book previews, and more. Like everything else we do, it’s FREE! Subscribe at https://raptinterviews.com/.

. . . . .

About your hosts:

Justin Camp is a writer and storyteller with a heart for adventure. He created the WiRE devotional for men with modern, busy men in mind and writes books, articles, and devotionals aimed at equipping & encouraging men of all ages. He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.

item.title: Are You Unwittingly Rejecting God’s Gifts and Provision?

item.title: Step Into Your Authority in Jesus' Name
item.description:

item.title: The Power of Prayer: A Lesson From St. Patrick
item.description:
One of the most powerful prayers ever recorded comes from St. Patrick, who is said to have performed mighty miracles through the power of prayer. Start the day right with this prayer.

. . . .

Twice a month, we serve up a curated newsletter of fascinating articles, new books & music we think you might like, exclusive book previews, and more. Like everything else we do, it’s FREE! Subscribe at https://raptinterviews.com/.

. . . . .

About your hosts:

Justin Camp is a writer and storyteller with a heart for adventure. He created the WiRE devotional for men with modern, busy men in mind and writes books, articles, and devotionals aimed at equipping & encouraging men of all ages. He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.

item.title: Friendship With God and Others: A Beautiful Exchange
item.description:

item.title: How to Deepen Your Relationship With God in the Storms
item.description:
When you’re in the storms and you’re overwhelmed with fear, it’s important you stand firm. Even in the storms, you can deepen your relationship with God and strengthen your faith.

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. Through our five ministries, we equip men and women to encounter God in the every-day lives they’re living. From Loop for Women, an email devotional focused on beauty & prayer, to WiRE for Men, an email devotional that helps men see life with God as the greatest adventure of all time, we hope we have something that matters to you.

. . . . .

Enjoying Rush? Please SUBSCRIBE to keep fresh episodes coming your way. Also, we’d be honored if you’d rate and review the podcast, as it helps others find and be encouraged by listening to it. To do so, scroll down the episode list in your chosen app until you reach the “Ratings & Reviews” section (Apple) or visit the show homepage, select the three dots next to the gear icon and tap “Rate show” (Spotify). Thank you!

Rush is made possible through generous, tax-deductible donations. You’ll notice we don’t run ads or use affiliate links. For more than ten years, God has provided faithful partners like you who keep this ministry going. We’d love your support. Visit https://www.gatherministries.com today and click “DONATE NOW” to help.

. . . . .

item.title: How to Receive God’s Love When You Distrust His Presence
item.description:

→ Loop for Women, a three-times-a-week email devotional anchored in prophetic prayer and designed to help you receive God’s love, meditate on his beauty, and tend to your precious heart. Subscribe FREE at https://www.loopforwomen.com.

→ WiRE for Men, a twice-a-week email devotional for men that tackles tough questions like “What does it mean to be a man today?” and “Why am I so angry?” and “How can I find true friendship?”. Subscribe FREE at https://www.wireformen.com.

WiRE is written by Justin Camp, author of Invention: Break Free from the Culture Hell-Bent on Holding You Back, Odyssey: Encounter the God of Heaven and Escape the Surly Bonds of this World, and Rescue: When God's Cavalry Arrives to Deliver You from Quiet Desperation. item.title: Receiving God’s Gifts: Why Your Unique Personality Matters
item.description:
When we hear God speak to us about gifts He has given us, it’s easy to be a bit skeptical. We might doubt that we have gifts at all—at least of any significance. We live in a world that ranks gifts based on wealth, social status, power. So it can be easy to look around and feel like what we have to offer isn’t much. But that’s not what God feels out about us. That’s not what God thinks.

Holy Spirit offers us a different perspective. Our unique personalities, our quirks, our ways of being in this world—these are our gifts. And they allow us to experience—and express—God’s love. They bring what He brings: hope to the trapped; healing to the hurting; direction to the lost; love to all He has created.

And these gifts also bring him glory. They point to him, to who God is, to his strength and his plans for good in the world. For the restoration of all things. We are free to be ourselves. And that being ourselves? That is the best gift we can ever give to the world.

item.content:encoded:
When we hear God speak to us about gifts He has given us, it’s easy to be a bit skeptical. We might doubt that we have gifts at all—at least of any significance. We live in a world that ranks gifts based on wealth, social status, power. So it can be easy to look around and feel like what we have to offer isn’t much. But that’s not what God feels out about us. That’s not what God thinks.

Holy Spirit offers us a different perspective. Our unique personalities, our quirks, our ways of being in this world—these are our gifts. And they allow us to experience—and express—God’s love. They bring what He brings: hope to the trapped; healing to the hurting; direction to the lost; love to all He has created.

And these gifts also bring him glory. They point to him, to who God is, to his strength and his plans for good in the world. For the restoration of all things. Holy Spirit, in this message, said, “The key to experiencing [our gifts] is knowing my love. They only exist in my love.” When we know God’s love for us, we move in the world in a different way. We are free to be ourselves. And that being ourselves? That is the best gift we can ever give to the world.

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. Through our five ministries, we equip men and women to encounter God in the every-day lives they’re living. From Loop for Women, an email devotional focused on beauty & prayer, to WiRE for Men, an email devotional that helps men see life with God as the greatest adventure of all time, we hope we have something that matters to you.

. . . . .

For more than ten years, God has provided faithful partners like you who keep this ministry going. We’d love your support. Justin Camp is a writer and storyteller with a heart for adventure. item.title: Holy Spirit's Power to Pursue the Lost Ones You Love
item.description:

item.title: Waiting for God With Joy and Expectation
item.description:

. . . .

. . . . .

To do so, scroll down the episode list in your chosen app until you reach the “Ratings & Reviews” section (Apple) or visit the show homepage, select the three dots next to the gear icon and tap “Rate show” (Spotify). Thank you!

Rush is made possible through generous, tax-deductible donations. You’ll notice we don’t run ads or use affiliate links. item.title: Finding Freedom From Shame in Confession
item.description:
When we hide our sins, the shame and guilt only fester. But when we step into confession and obedience, we give God’s people the opportunity to show us compassion. Will you choose to be vulnerable?

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. Through our five ministries, we equip men and women to encounter God in the every-day lives they’re living. . . . . .

To do so, scroll down the episode list in your chosen app until you reach the “Ratings & Reviews” section (Apple) or visit the show homepage, select the three dots next to the gear icon and tap “Rate show” (Spotify). item.title: Accepting God’s Love When We’ve Fallen Into Sin
item.description:
We know we need to confess and repent whenever we’ve fallen into sin. But the third step, accepting God’s love and forgiveness, can be hardest to do when we’re struggling with sin. This episode helps you tune into Holy Spirit and what He has to say about our patterns of sin and how accepting God's love is key to the transformation of our hearts.

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. item.title: God Doesn’t Hide—How to Find God When You Feel Alone
item.description:
If you feel alone, you don’t have to go find God because God doesn’t hide from you. He’s here, and what he wants most is a relationship with you filled with love.

. . . .

item.title: What Misconceptions of God Keep You From Knowing Him More?
item.description:
How do you feel about God? Often, our misconceptions of God and who He is block us from knowing Him better. Learn how to expose those misconceptions and believe the truth about God’s character.

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. → Loop for Women, a three-times-a-week email devotional anchored in prophetic prayer and designed to help you receive God’s love, meditate on his beauty, and tend to your precious heart. Subscribe FREE at https://www.loopforwomen.com.

→ WiRE for Men, a twice-a-week email devotional for men that tackles tough questions like “What does it mean to be a man today?” and “Why am I so angry?” and “How can I find true friendship?”. Subscribe FREE at https://www.wireformen.com.

item.title: Trusting the Potter’s Loving Plan for Your Life
item.description:
You have dreams and desires but don’t know how they will play out in your life. But the Potter does. Your Father, your loving Potter, has a loving plan for you. Will you trust him?

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. Through our five ministries, we equip men and women to encounter God in the every-day lives they’re living. From Loop for Women, an email devotional focused on beauty & prayer, to WiRE for Men, an email devotional that helps men see life with God as the greatest adventure of all time, we hope we have something that matters to you.

. . . . .

Enjoying Rush? Please SUBSCRIBE to keep fresh episodes coming your way. Also, we’d be honored if you’d rate and review the podcast, as it helps others find and be encouraged by listening to it. To do so, scroll down the episode list in your chosen app until you reach the “Ratings & Reviews” section (Apple) or visit the show homepage, select the three dots next to the gear icon and tap “Rate show” (Spotify). Thank you!

Rush is made possible through generous, tax-deductible donations. You’ll notice we don’t run ads or use affiliate links. For more than ten years, God has provided faithful partners like you who keep this ministry going. We’d love your support. Visit https://www.gatherministries.com today and click “DONATE NOW” to help.

. . . . .

Looking for more FREE resources to equip your heart and fortify your spirit? Consider:

→ Loop for Women, a three-times-a-week email devotional anchored in prophetic prayer and designed to help you receive God’s love, meditate on his beauty, and tend to your precious heart. Subscribe FREE at https://www.loopforwomen.com.

Jennifer is the author of the best-selling book Breathing Eden: Conversations with God on Light, Fresh Air, and New Things. You can find it at https://bit.ly/Breathing-Eden.

→ WiRE for Men, a twice-a-week email devotional for men that tackles tough questions like “What does it mean to be a man today?” and “Why am I so angry?” and “How can I find true friendship?”. Subscribe FREE at https://www.wireformen.com.

WiRE is written by Justin Camp, author of Invention: Break Free from the Culture Hell-Bent on Holding You Back, Odyssey: Encounter the God of Heaven and Escape the Surly Bonds of this World, and Rescue: When God's Cavalry Arrives to Deliver You from Quiet Desperation. You can find them at https://bit.ly/WiRE-Series-for-Men or wherever books are sold.

→ Flag Messages, a once-a-week email that helps you encounter God through prayer, Scripture, and guided exercises. Flag invites you to go deeper into who God is, who he says you are, and what it means for the lives we’re living right now. Subscribe FREE at https://flagmessages.io/.

→ Rapt Interviews is a hub for curious, thoughtful thinkers, culture-changers, and creatives. Through interviews with the authors, pastors, and musicians you know and love, we give you a glimpse into how they’re encountering God in the midst of their dynamic lives. Twice a month, we serve up a curated newsletter of fascinating articles, new books & music we think you might like, exclusive book previews, and more. Like everything else we do, it’s FREE! Subscribe at https://raptinterviews.com/.

. . . . .

About your hosts:

Justin Camp is a writer and storyteller with a heart for adventure. He created the WiRE devotional for men with modern, busy men in mind and writes books, articles, and devotionals aimed at equipping & encouraging men of all ages. He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.

He created the WiRE devotional for men with modern, busy men in mind and writes books, articles, and devotionals aimed at equipping & encouraging men of all ages. He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Bring the Walls Down: How to Let Jesus Heal Your Broken Heart
item.description:
We all have walls we’ve built in our lives to hide our true selves. But these defense mechanisms only push God away. Learn how to let your guard down so Jesus can heal the broken places in your life.

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. Through our five ministries, we equip men and women to encounter God in the every-day lives they’re living. From Loop for Women, an email devotional focused on beauty & prayer, to WiRE for Men, an email devotional that helps men see life with God as the greatest adventure of all time, we hope we have something that matters to you.

. . . . .

Enjoying Rush? Please SUBSCRIBE to keep fresh episodes coming your way. Also, we’d be honored if you’d rate and review the podcast, as it helps others find and be encouraged by listening to it. To do so, scroll down the episode list in your chosen app until you reach the “Ratings & Reviews” section (Apple) or visit the show homepage, select the three dots next to the gear icon and tap “Rate show” (Spotify). Thank you!

Rush is made possible through generous, tax-deductible donations. You’ll notice we don’t run ads or use affiliate links. For more than ten years, God has provided faithful partners like you who keep this ministry going. We’d love your support. Visit https://www.gatherministries.com today and click “DONATE NOW” to help.

. . . . .

Looking for more FREE resources to equip your heart and fortify your spirit? Consider:

→ Loop for Women, a three-times-a-week email devotional anchored in prophetic prayer and designed to help you receive God’s love, meditate on his beauty, and tend to your precious heart. Subscribe FREE at https://www.loopforwomen.com.

Jennifer is the author of the best-selling book Breathing Eden: Conversations with God on Light, Fresh Air, and New Things. You can find it at https://bit.ly/Breathing-Eden.

→ WiRE for Men, a twice-a-week email devotional for men that tackles tough questions like “What does it mean to be a man today?” and “Why am I so angry?” and “How can I find true friendship?”. Subscribe FREE at https://www.wireformen.com.

WiRE is written by Justin Camp, author of Invention: Break Free from the Culture Hell-Bent on Holding You Back, Odyssey: Encounter the God of Heaven and Escape the Surly Bonds of this World, and Rescue: When God's Cavalry Arrives to Deliver You from Quiet Desperation. You can find them at https://bit.ly/WiRE-Series-for-Men or wherever books are sold.

→ Flag Messages, a once-a-week email that helps you encounter God through prayer, Scripture, and guided exercises. Flag invites you to go deeper into who God is, who he says you are, and what it means for the lives we’re living right now. Subscribe FREE at https://flagmessages.io/.

You can find them at https://bit.ly/WiRE-Series-for-Men or wherever books are sold.

→ Flag Messages, a once-a-week email that helps you encounter God through prayer, Scripture, and guided exercises. Flag invites you to go deeper into who God is, who he says you are, and what it means for the lives we’re living right now. Subscribe FREE at https://flagmessages.io/.

→ Rapt Interviews is a hub for curious, thoughtful thinkers, culture-changers, and creatives. Through interviews with the authors, pastors, and musicians you know and love, we give you a glimpse into how they’re encountering God in the midst of their dynamic lives. Twice a month, we serve up a curated newsletter of fascinating articles, new books & music we think you might like, exclusive book previews, and more. Like everything else we do, it’s FREE! Subscribe at https://raptinterviews.com/.

. . . . .

About your hosts:

Justin Camp is a writer and storyteller with a heart for adventure. He created the WiRE devotional for men with modern, busy men in mind and writes books, articles, and devotionals aimed at equipping & encouraging men of all ages. He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.

item.title: Are You Carrying the Weight of the World?

item.title: Pursuing Healing: Saying Yes to Jesus
item.description:

item.title: Trade Comparison and Envy for Joy and Contentment
item.description:

→ Loop for Women, a three-times-a-week email devotional anchored in prophetic prayer and designed to help you receive God’s love, meditate on his beauty, and tend to your precious heart. Subscribe FREE at https://www.loopforwomen.com.

→ WiRE for Men, a twice-a-week email devotional for men that tackles tough questions like “What does it mean to be a man today?” and “Why am I so angry?” and “How can I find true friendship?”. Subscribe FREE at https://www.wireformen.com.

WiRE is written by Justin Camp, author of Invention: Break Free from the Culture Hell-Bent on Holding You Back, Odyssey: Encounter the God of Heaven and Escape the Surly Bonds of this World, and Rescue: When God's Cavalry Arrives to Deliver You from Quiet Desperation. item.title: What God Is Really Like: Seeing His True Personality
item.description:

item.title: Love Is Not Control: How to Respond to People’s Bad Choices
item.description:

item.title: Let God in to Heal Your Brokenness and Pain

item.title: What To Do When People Hurt Us
item.description:
When people hurt us, our gut reaction is often to shut everyone out. After all, vulnerability means we can get hurt again. But God doesn’t want you to close people off. Learn what he calls you to do instead.

item.title: How to Cultivate a Personal Relationship With Holy Spirit
item.description:
To grow and mature in faith, it’s important that you cultivate a personal relationship with Holy Spirit. That might seem daunting, but it doesn’t have to be. Learn how to deepen your relationship with Holy Spirit in this podcast.

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. Through our five ministries, we equip men and women to encounter God in the every-day lives they’re living. From Loop for Women, an email devotional focused on beauty & prayer, to WiRE for Men, an email devotional that helps men see life with God as the greatest adventure of all time, we hope we have something that matters to you.

. . . . .

Enjoying Rush? Please SUBSCRIBE to keep fresh episodes coming your way. Also, we’d be honored if you’d rate and review the podcast, as it helps others find and be encouraged by listening to it. To do so, scroll down the episode list in your chosen app until you reach the “Ratings & Reviews” section (Apple) or visit the show homepage, select the three dots next to the gear icon and tap “Rate show” (Spotify). Thank you!

Rush is made possible through generous, tax-deductible donations. You’ll notice we don’t run ads or use affiliate links. For more than ten years, God has provided faithful partners like you who keep this ministry going. We’d love your support. Visit https://www.gatherministries.com today and click “DONATE NOW” to help.

. . . . .

Looking for more FREE resources to equip your heart and fortify your spirit? Consider:

→ Loop for Women, a three-times-a-week email devotional anchored in prophetic prayer and designed to help you receive God’s love, meditate on his beauty, and tend to your precious heart. Subscribe FREE at https://www.loopforwomen.com.

Jennifer is the author of the best-selling book Breathing Eden: Conversations with God on Light, Fresh Air, and New Things. You can find it at https://bit.ly/Breathing-Eden.

→ WiRE for Men, a twice-a-week email devotional for men that tackles tough questions like “What does it mean to be a man today?” and “Why am I so angry?” and “How can I find true friendship?”. Subscribe FREE at https://www.wireformen.com.

WiRE is written by Justin Camp, author of Invention: Break Free from the Culture Hell-Bent on Holding You Back, Odyssey: Encounter the God of Heaven and Escape the Surly Bonds of this World, and Rescue: When God's Cavalry Arrives to Deliver You from Quiet Desperation. You can find them at https://bit.ly/WiRE-Series-for-Men or wherever books are sold.

→ Flag Messages, a once-a-week email that helps you encounter God through prayer, Scripture, and guided exercises. Flag invites you to go deeper into who God is, who he says you are, and what it means for the lives we’re living right now. Subscribe FREE at https://flagmessages.io/.

→ Rapt Interviews is a hub for curious, thoughtful thinkers, culture-changers, and creatives. Through interviews with the authors, pastors, and musicians you know and love, we give you a glimpse into how they’re encountering God in the midst of their dynamic lives. Twice a month, we serve up a curated newsletter of fascinating articles, new books & music we think you might like, exclusive book previews, and more. Like everything else we do, it’s FREE! Subscribe at https://raptinterviews.com/.

. . . . .

About your hosts:

Justin Camp is a writer and storyteller with a heart for adventure. He created the WiRE devotional for men with modern, busy men in mind and writes books, articles, and devotionals aimed at equipping & encouraging men of all ages. He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.

He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.

item.title: Freedom From the Law You Create for Yourself
item.description:

. . . .

You can find them at https://bit.ly/WiRE-Series-for-Men or wherever books are sold.

→ Flag Messages, a once-a-week email that helps you encounter God through prayer, Scripture, and guided exercises. Flag invites you to go deeper into who God is, who he says you are, and what it means for the lives we’re living right now. Subscribe FREE at https://flagmessages.io/.

→ Rapt Interviews is a hub for curious, thoughtful thinkers, culture-changers, and creatives. Through interviews with the authors, pastors, and musicians you know and love, we give you a glimpse into how they’re encountering God in the midst of their dynamic lives. Twice a month, we serve up a curated newsletter of fascinating articles, new books & music we think you might like, exclusive book previews, and more. Like everything else we do, it’s FREE! Subscribe at https://raptinterviews.com/.

. . . . .

About your hosts:

Justin Camp is a writer and storyteller with a heart for adventure. He created the WiRE devotional for men with modern, busy men in mind and writes books, articles, and devotionals aimed at equipping & encouraging men of all ages. He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.

item.title: Freedom From the Exhausting Drive to Perform

item.title: The Real Reason You Keep Lying and How to Stop
item.description:
The easiest way Satan pulls you into lying is by getting you to doubt God’s goodness. He gets us to lie to others by leading us to believe that God lied to us! Find out how to stop this duplicitous trend.

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. Through our five ministries, we equip men and women to encounter God in the every-day lives they’re living. . . . . .

To do so, scroll down the episode list in your chosen app until you reach the “Ratings & Reviews” section (Apple) or visit the show homepage, select the three dots next to the gear icon and tap “Rate show” (Spotify). item.title: The Secret to Seeing God With Childlike Wonder

→ Loop for Women, a three-times-a-week email devotional anchored in prophetic prayer and designed to help you receive God’s love, meditate on his beauty, and tend to your precious heart. Subscribe FREE at https://www.loopforwomen.com.

item.title: What’s Robbing You of Hope? Exposing the Trap of Despair

item.title: What Happens When God Is Your Strong Foundation
item.description:
When you make God your strong foundation, you discover stability the world can’t provide—no matter how much money, sex, or fame you get. Learn how to trust God with every step you take.

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. Through our five ministries, we equip men and women to encounter God in the every-day lives they’re living. From Loop for Women, an email devotional focused on beauty & prayer, to WiRE for Men, an email devotional that helps men see life with God as the greatest adventure of all time, we hope we have something that matters to you.

. . . . .

Enjoying Rush? Please SUBSCRIBE to keep fresh episodes coming your way. Also, we’d be honored if you’d rate and review the podcast, as it helps others find and be encouraged by listening to it. To do so, scroll down the episode list in your chosen app until you reach the “Ratings & Reviews” section (Apple) or visit the show homepage, select the three dots next to the gear icon and tap “Rate show” (Spotify). Thank you!

Rush is made possible through generous, tax-deductible donations. You’ll notice we don’t run ads or use affiliate links. For more than ten years, God has provided faithful partners like you who keep this ministry going. We’d love your support. Visit https://www.gatherministries.com today and click “DONATE NOW” to help.

. . . . .

Looking for more FREE resources to equip your heart and fortify your spirit? Consider:

→ Loop for Women, a three-times-a-week email devotional anchored in prophetic prayer and designed to help you receive God’s love, meditate on his beauty, and tend to your precious heart. Subscribe FREE at https://www.loopforwomen.com.

Jennifer is the author of the best-selling book Breathing Eden: Conversations with God on Light, Fresh Air, and New Things. You can find it at https://bit.ly/Breathing-Eden.

→ WiRE for Men, a twice-a-week email devotional for men that tackles tough questions like “What does it mean to be a man today?” and “Why am I so angry?” and “How can I find true friendship?”. Subscribe FREE at https://www.wireformen.com.

WiRE is written by Justin Camp, author of Invention: Break Free from the Culture Hell-Bent on Holding You Back, Odyssey: Encounter the God of Heaven and Escape the Surly Bonds of this World, and Rescue: When God's Cavalry Arrives to Deliver You from Quiet Desperation. You can find them at https://bit.ly/WiRE-Series-for-Men or wherever books are sold.

→ Flag Messages, a once-a-week email that helps you encounter God through prayer, Scripture, and guided exercises. Flag invites you to go deeper into who God is, who he says you are, and what it means for the lives we’re living right now. Subscribe FREE at https://flagmessages.io/.

→ Rapt Interviews is a hub for curious, thoughtful thinkers, culture-changers, and creatives. Through interviews with the authors, pastors, and musicians you know and love, we give you a glimpse into how they’re encountering God in the midst of their dynamic lives. Twice a month, we serve up a curated newsletter of fascinating articles, new books & music we think you might like, exclusive book previews, and more. Like everything else we do, it’s FREE! Subscribe at https://raptinterviews.com/.

. . . . .

About your hosts:

Justin Camp is a writer and storyteller with a heart for adventure. He created the WiRE devotional for men with modern, busy men in mind and writes books, articles, and devotionals aimed at equipping & encouraging men of all ages. He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.

item.title: God Is With You in the Flames

item.title: Defeating the Trap of Comparison in Our Lives
item.description:

item.title: When Your Suffering Is Too Much, Cling to This Truth
item.description:
Sometimes life can seem like it’s too much to bear. But when you allow Jesus to carry your heavy burden, you realize this simple truth: Your life is just beginning.

. . . .

Rush Podcast is a production of Gather Ministries (https://www.gatherministries.com/), a non-profit organization led by Jennifer & Justin Camp. Through our five ministries, we equip men and women to encounter God in the every-day lives they’re living. From Loop for Women, an email devotional focused on beauty & prayer, to WiRE for Men, an email devotional that helps men see life with God as the greatest adventure of all time, we hope we have something that matters to you.

. . . . .

Enjoying Rush? Please SUBSCRIBE to keep fresh episodes coming your way. Also, we’d be honored if you’d rate and review the podcast, as it helps others find and be encouraged by listening to it. To do so, scroll down the episode list in your chosen app until you reach the “Ratings & Reviews” section (Apple) or visit the show homepage, select the three dots next to the gear icon and tap “Rate show” (Spotify). Thank you!

Rush is made possible through generous, tax-deductible donations. You’ll notice we don’t run ads or use affiliate links. For more than ten years, God has provided faithful partners like you who keep this ministry going. We’d love your support. Visit https://www.gatherministries.com today and click “DONATE NOW” to help.

. . . . .

Looking for more FREE resources to equip your heart and fortify your spirit? Consider:

→ Loop for Women, a three-times-a-week email devotional anchored in prophetic prayer and designed to help you receive God’s love, meditate on his beauty, and tend to your precious heart. Subscribe FREE at https://www.loopforwomen.com.

Jennifer is the author of the best-selling book Breathing Eden: Conversations with God on Light, Fresh Air, and New Things. You can find it at https://bit.ly/Breathing-Eden.

→ WiRE for Men, a twice-a-week email devotional for men that tackles tough questions like “What does it mean to be a man today?” and “Why am I so angry?” and “How can I find true friendship?”. Subscribe FREE at https://www.wireformen.com.

WiRE is written by Justin Camp, author of Invention: Break Free from the Culture Hell-Bent on Holding You Back, Odyssey: Encounter the God of Heaven and Escape the Surly Bonds of this World, and Rescue: When God's Cavalry Arrives to Deliver You from Quiet Desperation. You can find them at https://bit.ly/WiRE-Series-for-Men or wherever books are sold.

→ Flag Messages, a once-a-week email that helps you encounter God through prayer, Scripture, and guided exercises. Flag invites you to go deeper into who God is, who he says you are, and what it means for the lives we’re living right now. Subscribe FREE at https://flagmessages.io/.

→ Rapt Interviews is a hub for curious, thoughtful thinkers, culture-changers, and creatives. Through interviews with the authors, pastors, and musicians you know and love, we give you a glimpse into how they’re encountering God in the midst of their dynamic lives. Twice a month, we serve up a curated newsletter of fascinating articles, new books & music we think you might like, exclusive book previews, and more. Like everything else we do, it’s FREE! Subscribe at https://raptinterviews.com/.

. . . . .

About your hosts:

Justin Camp is a writer and storyteller with a heart for adventure. He created the WiRE devotional for men with modern, busy men in mind and writes books, articles, and devotionals aimed at equipping & encouraging men of all ages. He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.

He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.
item.content:encoded:

. . . .

About your hosts:

Justin Camp is a writer and storyteller with a heart for adventure. He created the WiRE devotional for men with modern, busy men in mind and writes books, articles, and devotionals aimed at equipping & encouraging men of all ages. He is a co-founder of Gather Ministries, a nonprofit he runs with his wife, Jennifer, and before he decided to spend his days with a pen and his favorite journal always nearby, he was a venture capitalist in Silicon Valley and a lawyer on Wall Street. Justin, Jennifer, and their three children live in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Jennifer Camp, co-founder of Gather Ministries, grew up in an almond orchard in Northern California. A former high school English teacher, she loves to write and encourage people to go deeper into their own stories and into their identities in Christ. Jennifer is the Amazon bestselling author of Breathing Eden: On Light, Fresh Air, and New Things and Loop: What Women Need to Know. She also writes at jenniferjcamp.com and is bringing a poetry collection into the world in early 2024.

item.title: Embrace a New Way of Living
item.description: You probably see now that your old way of living won’t work for you anymore. In Christ, you’re called to embrace a new way of living, and it starts by turning away from what doesn’t give you life.
